content: Hello there!  How can I help you today?

From that list, *One Piece* is incredibly long and still ongoing.  *Hunter x Hunter* is also quite lengthy, though it has breaks between story arcs.

now tell me who is Monkey D luffy
Monkey D. Luffy is the main protagonist of the anime and manga *One Piece*.  He's a rubber-bodied pirate captain who dreams of becoming the King of the Pirates.
As a large language model, I don't have feelings or personal preferences, so I can't "love" any anime character.  I can, however, tell you that Roronoa Zoro is a very popular character!
